i18n.key: Rich text field that allows entering a description of the shelf that can be displayed on the homepage of the site topic associated with the shelf
A text field used both on the websites and in the admin interface to identify the shelf.
Some content that can be used as a substitute in the "Page title" and "Description" fields for pages that contain the "Contextual list of shelves" or "Contextual list of products" display blocks.
Some content that can be used as a substitute in the "Keywords" field for pages that contain the "Contextual list of shelves" or "Contextual list of products" display blocks.
Some content that can be used as a substitute in the "Page title" and "Description" fields for pages that contain the "Contextual list of shelves" or "Contextual list of products" display blocks.
An image from the RBS Change media store that will be used in the lists to illustrate the shelf.
